title: Warp Protocol Schema
description: Generic schema for defining actions and metadata for blockchain transactions.

protocol.title: Protocol Identifier
protocol.description: Specifies the protocol version and identifier, e.g., 'warp:0.1.0'.

title.title: Warp Title
title.description: A brief title describing the warp.

description.title: Warp Description
description.description: A detailed description of the warp's purpose.

preview.title: Preview Image URL
preview.description: A URL to a preview image for the warp.

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: A list of actions involved in the warp.

type.title: Action Type
type.description: Specifies the action type as a contract.

label.title: Action Label
label.description: A label for the action, e.g., 'Transfer Funds'.

description.title: Action Description
description.description: A description of what the contract action does.

address.title: Contract Address
address.description: The blockchain address involved in the contract action.

func.title: Function Name
func.description: The name of the function to call in the contract.

args.title: Arguments
args.description: A list of arguments for the contract function call.

gasLimit.title: Minimum Gas Limit
gasLimit.description: The minimum gas limit for the contract function call.

value.title: Value
value.description: The value to be sent with the contract call.

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: A list of inputs required for the contract action.

name.title: Input Name
name.description: The name of the input field.

description.title: Input Description
description.description: A description of the input field.

position.title: Position
position.description: The position of the input in the function call.

required.title: Is Required
required.description: Indicates if the input is required.

min.title: Minimum Value
min.description: The minimum value for the input.

max.title: Maximum Value
max.description: The maximum value for the input.

type.title: Action Type
type.description: Specifies the action type as a link.

label.title: Action Label
label.description: A label for the link action.

description.title: Action Description
description.description: A description of what the link action does.

url.title: Link URL
url.description: The URL for additional information or actions.

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: A list of inputs for the link action.

name.title: Input Name
name.description: The name of the input field.

description.title: Input Description
description.description: A description of the input field.

required.title: Is Required
required.description: Indicates if the input is required.

min.title: Minimum Value
min.description: The minimum value for the input.

max.title: Maximum Value
max.description: The maximum value for the input.
